Description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 15% (+15% per stack).
Name: Focus Crystal
Pickup: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.

Description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
Name: Fuel Cell
Pickup: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Pickup: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m (+6m per stack).
Name: Frost Relic
Pickup: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

Description: Heal for 10 (+10 per stack) health 1.1 seconds after getting hurt.
Name: Medkit
Pickup: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 6 (+6 per stack) health.
Name: Monster Tooth
Pickup: Drop a healing orb on kill.

Description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).
Name: Paul's Goat Hoof
Pickup: Move faster.

Description: Gain a 25 (+25 per stack) health shield. Recharges outside of danger.
Name: Personal Shield Generator
Pickup: Gain a recharging shield.

Description: A hidden cache containing an item will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity of the item per stack).
Name: Rusted Key
Pickup: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains treasure.

Description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).
Name: Soldier's Syringe
Pickup: Increases attack speed.

Description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Name: Sticky Bomb
Pickup: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
Name: Stun Grenade
Pickup: Chance to stun on hit.

Description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).
Name: Topaz Brooch
Pickup: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
Name: Tougher Times
Pickup: Chance to block incoming damage.

Description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
Name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Pickup: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Description: On level up drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
Name: Warbanner
Pickup: Drop a Warbanner on leveling up, giving you great strength.

Description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Name: Bundle of Fireworks
Pickup: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.
Name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
Pickup: Deal extra damage to bosses.

Description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
Name: Backup Magazine
Pickup: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Description: After standing still for 2 seconds, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).
Name: Bustling Fungus
Pickup: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 2 seconds.

Description: Increases passive health regeneration by 300% (+300% per stack) while outside of combat.
Name: Cautious Slug
Pickup: Rapidly heal outside of danger.

Description: Deal 150% (+50% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
Name: Crowbar
Pickup: Deal more damage to healthy enemies.

Description: Sprint speed is improved by 30% (+20% per stack).
Name: Energy Drink
Pickup: Sprint faster.

Description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack). Enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.
Name: Gasoline
Pickup: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

Description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.
Name: Lepton Daisy
Pickup: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event.

Description: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Pickup: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

Description: Chance on taking damage to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 3s (+1.5s per stack). Chance increases the more damage you take.
Name: Old War Stealthkit
Pickup: Turn invisible on taking heavy damage.

Description: Critical strikes increase attack speed by 10%. Maximum cap of 30% (+20% per stack) attack speed.
Name: Predatory Instincts
Pickup: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).
Name: Red Whip
Pickup: Move fast out of combat.

Description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.
Name: Rose Buckler
Pickup: Reduce incoming damage while sprinting.

Description: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% and dealing 250% (+125% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Name: Runald's Band
Pickup: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast.

Description: 25% chance to fire chain lighting for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).
Name: Ukulele
Pickup: ...and his music was electric.

Description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
Name: War Horn
Pickup: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
Name: Wax Quail
Pickup: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.
Name: Will-o'-the-wisp
Pickup: Detonate enemies on kill.

Description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
Pickup: Chance to fire a missile.

Description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 20% (+20% per stack) health.
Name: Old Guillotine
Pickup: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Description: 18% + (10% on stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Name: Bandolier
Pickup: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).
Name: Chronobauble
Pickup: Slow enemies on hit.

Description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.
Name: Harvester's Scythe
Pickup: 'Critical Strikes' heal you.

Description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.
Name: Hopoo Feather
Pickup: Gain an extra jump.

Description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1, up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
Name: Infusion
Pickup: Killing an enemy permanently increases your health, up to 100.

Description: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado, dealing 500% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Name: Kjaro's Band
Pickup: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado.

Description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.
Name: Leeching Seed
Pickup: Dealing damage heals you.

Description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.
Name: 57 Leaf Clover
Pickup: Luck is on your side.

Description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.
Name: Aegis
Pickup: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).
Name: Alien Head
Pickup: Reduces cooldowns for your skills.

Description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 3s (+2s per stack) where skills have no cooldowns.
Name: Brainstalks
Pickup: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+1.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.
Name: Brilliant Behemoth
Pickup: All your attacks explode!

Description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.
Name: Ceremonial Dagger
Pickup: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
Name: Dio's Best Friend
Pickup: Cheat death. Consumed on use.

Description: Increase jump height. Creates a 10m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 2300% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.
Name: H3AD-5T v2
Pickup: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.

Description: Killing enemies has a 10% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
Name: Happiest Mask
Pickup: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
Name: Hardlight Afterburner
Pickup: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

Description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
Name: N'kuhana's Opinion
Pickup: Fire haunting skulls when healed.

Description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.
Name: Rejuvenation Rack
Pickup: Double the strength of healing.

Description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Name: Sentient Meat Hook
Pickup: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
Name: Shattering Justice
Pickup: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).
Name: Soulbound Catalyst
Pickup: Kills reduce equipment cooldown.

Description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
Name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Pickup: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

Description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).
Name: Wake of Vultures
Pickup: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

Description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.
Name: Halcyon Seed
Pickup: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and health regeneration by 1.6 (+1.6 per stack) health / second.
Name: Titanic Knurl
Pickup: Boosts health and regeneration.

Description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.
Name: Queen's Gland
Pickup: Recruit a Beetle Guard.

Description: Fire a tracking wisp for 100% (+100% per stack) damage. Fires every 0.5 seconds while sprinting.
Name: Little Disciple
Pickup: Fire tracking wisps while sprinting.

Description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% per stack) of your health per second.
Name: Corpsebloom
Pickup: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

Description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).
Name: Shaped Glass
Pickup: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

Description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Name: Gesture of the Drowned
Pickup: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

Description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
Name: Strides of Heresy
Pickup: Replace your Utility Skill with 'Shadowfade'.

Description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.
Name: Transcendence
Pickup: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Description: 30% chance on hit to gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold. Lose gold equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of amount you are hit for OR lose % gold equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health % you lost. Chooses the greater of the two.
Name: Brittle Crown
Pickup: Gain gold on hit... BUT lose gold on getting hit.

Description: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20.
Name: Effigy of Grief
Pickup: Drop an effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can be picked back up.

Description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.
Name: Glowing Meteorite
Pickup: Rain meteors from the sky, hurting both enemies and allies.

Description: Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.
Name: Helfire Tincture
Pickup: Burn everything nearby... including you and allies.

Description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 15 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
Name: Spinel Tonic
Pickup: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.

Description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.
Name: Gnarled Woodsprite
Pickup: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.

Description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.
Name: Milky Chrysalis
Pickup: Gain temporary flight.

Description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
Name: Ocular HUD
Pickup: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.
Name: Preon Accumulator
Pickup: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.

Description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds.
Name: Primordial Cube
Pickup: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.

Description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.
Name: Radar Scanner
Pickup: Reveal all nearby interactables.

Description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
Name: Royal Capacitor
Pickup: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.

Description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.
Name: The Back-up
Pickup: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.

Description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.
Name: The Crowdfunder
Pickup: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.

Description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.
Name: Volcanic Egg
Pickup: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.

Description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.
Name: Blast Shower
Pickup: Cleanse all negative effects.

Description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.
Name: Disposable Missile Launcher
Pickup: Fire a swarm of missiles.

Description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Name: Eccentric Vase
Pickup: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.

Description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.
Name: Foreign Fruit
Pickup: Heal on use.

Description: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
Name: Fuel Array
Pickup: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

Description: Become an aspect of fire.
Name: Ifrit's Distinction
Pickup: Become an aspect of fire.

Description: Become an aspect of lightning.
Name: Silence Between Two Strikes
Pickup: Become an aspect of lightning.

Description: Become an aspect of ice.
Name: Her Biting Embrace
Pickup: Become an aspect of ice.

Description: Become an aspect of corruption.
Name: N'kuhana's Retort
Pickup: Become an aspect of corruption.
